data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Veliko Tarnovo.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Veliko Tarnovo, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Veliko Tarnovo, Bulgaria to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Veliko Tarnovo, Bulgaria to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Veliko Tarnovo, Bulgaria to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Yoruk people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Yoruk people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Yoruk people is yours.
Spirit, encourage the church in Veliko Tarnovo, Bulgaria to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Veliko Tarnovo, Bulgaria to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Veliko Tarnovo, Bulgaria has a population of 229,800.

We estimate Veliko Tarnovo has 4,554 people who might know Jesus, 184,745 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 40,501 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 50 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Veliko Tarnovo, Bulgaria a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.
